name: Vogue Stack Toy
description: Vogue glasses that come in all shapes and sizes it is no wonder that this is one of the best-selling and most popular eyeglasses brands on the market.

name: Burberry
description: Burberry is famous for its luxury and amazing products. Rayban also have a good range of sunglasses but burberry has amazing design.

name: Prada
description: Prada makes stylish, high quality fashion sunglasses as well as models designed specifically for leisure

name: Christian Dior
description: The inside of the left temple arm of Dior sunglasses features the model name. Some models may also feature the letters CE, 'MADE IN ITALY'.

name: Ray-Ban
description: Original Ray-Ban sunglasses will have RB etched onto the corner of the left lens to prove its authenticity.

name: Valentino
description: In terms of sunglasses, Valentino frames are trendy and remarkably made, often playing with original or unconventional elements.
